pages.text: In order to make Shell, you'll need a Nacre. Shift click on this icon to see how to make one.

pages.name: Shell
pages.text: In order to have your Nacre construct a Drill, you will need to build this multiblock, then interact with her with a pickaxe in your hand.

pages.title: Creating a Pearl
pages.text: In order to use Shell, you will need to place the Shell over a block of White Gem essence, then insert 64 Gravel at the top, 64 Sand on the left, 64 Clay balls on the right, and a Chroma of your choice at the bottom. After time passes it'll slowly drain these materials, and once it's finished it will create a Pearl for you to collect.
